meta.description: Maximize profit from producing products A and B with byproduct C

params.name: front_time
params.description: Hours required for the front process per unit of product

params.name: back_time
params.description: Hours required for the back process per unit of product

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per unit of product sold

params.name: byproduct_profit
params.description: Profit per unit of byproduct C sold

params.name: disposal_cost
params.description: Disposal cost per unit of byproduct C

vars.name: x
vars.description: x[p] = units of product p produced

vars.name: y
vars.description: y = units of byproduct C sold

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS) + byproduct_profit * y - disposal_cost * (2 * x['B'] - y)
objective.description: Maximize total profit from products A, B, and byproduct C

constraints.name: front_process_time
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(front_time[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total front process time cannot exceed 16 hours

constraints.name: back_process_time
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(back_time[p] * x[p] for p in PRODUCTS)
constraints.description: Total back process time cannot exceed 24 hours

constraints.name: byproduct_balance
constraints.description: Units of byproduct C sold cannot exceed those produced
